title: 3dPval
description: Convert a dataset's statistical sub-bricks to p-values or other statistical representations.

zscore.title: Z-score flag
zscore.description: Convert statistic to a z-score instead, an N(0,1) deviate that represents the same p-value.

qval.title: Q-value flag
qval.description: Convert statistic to a q-value (FDR) instead. This option only works with datasets that have FDR curves inserted in their headers.

prefix.title: Output prefix
prefix.description: Prefix name for output file (default name is 'Pval').
